title: Two Storied House For Sale In Kapuwatte - Ja Ela
details: two storied house on 7 p. land close to kapuwatte church, close to negombo road, 3 bed rooms, 2 bath rooms, tiled floor, living, dining areas, pantry, parking space, front garden, right round wall and gate, clear titles, price Rs. 76 lakhs. Tel - 0772 691 922 .
